resources.string: Your time is limited, so don\'t waste it living someone else\'s life. Don\'t be trapped by dogma – which is living with the results of other people\'s thinking.

string-array.name: quotes
string-array.item: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
The mind is everything; what you think you become.
Believe you can and you\'re halfway there.
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
If you look at what you have in life, you\'ll always have more. If you look at what you don\'t have in life, you\'ll never have enough
Your time is limited, so don\'t waste it living someone else\'s life. Don\'t be trapped by dogma – which is living with the results of other people\'s thinking.
Don\'t judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.
Many of life\'s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
In the end, it\'s not the years in your life that count. It\'s the life in your years.
Do not let making a living prevent you from making a life.
Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing and there\'s so much to smile about.

string-array.name: authors
string-array.item: ~ Helen Keller
~ Steve Jobs
~ Buddha
~ Theodore Roosevelt
~ Nelson Mandela
~ Oprah Winfrey
~ Steve Jobs
~ Robert Louis Stevenson
~ Eleanor Roosevelt
~ Maya Angelou
~ Thomas A. Edison
~ Abraham Lincoln
~ John Wooden
~ Marilyn Monroe
